original_text: But the fields of pastureland belonging to their cities may not be sold, for that is their possession forever.
korean_text: 그러나 그들의 성읍 주위에 있는 들판은 그들의 영원한 소유지이니 팔지 못할지니라

sentences.original_text: But the fields of pastureland belonging to their cities
for that is their possession forever.
